steps.name: Given the Coordinator observes its own namespace
And automatic controller pod garbage collections has been switched off
And I have created a new TestResource resource
And I have waited to see at least one controller pod
When I force a second attempt at processing the resource
Then a new pod was created
And the old pod was removed

labels.name: feature
labels.value: As a controller developer, I only want one of my controller pods to execute against a given resource at a time and have the option to have successful pods garbage collected so that their behaviour is consistent and predictable
